amendment.description: To require a certification and report related to the enhanced multi mission parachute system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1031 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1031 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5793-5794) To require a certification and report related to the enhanced multi mission parachute system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1031 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1031 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 1003.
